#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char a[1001];
    gets(a);
    int i;
    for(i=0;a[i];i++)
    {
        if(a[i]=='a'||a[i]=='e'||a[i]=='i'||a[i]=='o'||a[i]=='u')
            i=i+2;
        cout <<a[i];
    }
    return 0;
}
